text: Teraemi tomalokaka srsti karaiche ejana byaktira paraa. Tara pichata te'om tara paraa tara yoraa srsti karaiche. Teraemi tomalokara babe atha yoraa gharaciya jantu aratirna karaiche. Teraemi tomalokaka tomalokara matrgarbhara traibidha andhakarata paryayakrame srsti karaiche. Teraemi allaha; tomalokara raba; sarbabhauma kartrtba kerala te'omrae'i; te'omra bahirae ana kono satya ilaha na'i. Eteke tomalokaka kaâ€™lai ghuraa'i niya haiche
